Tahar Cheriaa (January 5, 1927 - November 4, 2010) bụ onye Tunisia na-enyocha ihe
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Carthage Film Festival na 1966, mmemme ihe nkiri mbụ nke Panafrican na Panarab.
A mụrụ Cheriaa na Sayada na Tunisia
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Carthage Film Festival na 1966 ma duzie ihe omume ise mbụ a na-eme kwa afọ.
Cheria tinyere aka na ntụgharị nke uri Arabic
Ọ bụ onye edemede na ọnụ na-ekwuchitere omenala ihe nkiri Arab-African
E nyere ya Grand Cordon of National Merit
E liri ya n'obodo ya Sayada.
